Interface INurbs

Namespace
Vts.Modeling.ForwardSolvers
Assembly
Vts.dll

Defines the methods and properties that need to be implemented by the NurbsGenerator class and by its stub version, StubNurbsGenerator used for Unit Testing.

Parameters
